meanings.definition: A person who engages in conversation.
meanings.sent1: The converser at the party was very friendly and talked to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled converser and can chat with anyone about anything.
meanings.sent3: The converser at the zoo tried to chat with the monkeys, but they just ignored him.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a busy street, with thoughts and ideas constantly conversing with each other.
meanings.sent5: The little girl was a natural converser, always eager to share her stories with anyone who would listen.

meanings.sent1: During the meeting, he would often converser with his colleagues about work.
meanings.sent2: They would converser for hours about their favorite books and movies.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seemed to converser with each other in their own chirping language.
meanings.sent4: The waves of the ocean conversed with the shore, sharing stories of distant lands.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the trees and the wind conversed softly, creating a peaceful evening atmosphere.
